amendatorysection.chaptername: Decedents' Estates; Protection Of Persons And Property
amendatorysection.catchline: Right to make health care decisions; sections; effect.
amendatorysection.para: Subject to subsection (5) of section 30-3417 and subsection (7) of section 30-3420, in the absence of an effective designation of power of attorney for health care nothing in sections 30-3401 to 30-3432 shall affect any right a person may otherwise have to make health care decisions on behalf of another.
